text: Benjamin Jiménez Hernández (31 March 1938 - 26 November 2020) was a Mexican Roman Catholic bishop. He became a priest in 1963. He was the titular bishop of Sellectum and as auxiliary bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Culiacán, Mexico from 1989 to 1993 and then as bishop of the diocese from 1993 to 2011. Jiménez Hernández died on 26 November 2020 at the age of 82.Benjamin Jiménez Hernánez ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Mexican Roman Catholic bishops
title: Benjamín Jiménez Hernández
